greeting.name: Dmytro
greeting.message: I can translate all your ideas into reality!

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am organized and communicative person, having a desire to work with people from all over the world. I value honesty and responsibility and I expect the same from others. Nothing is impossible for me, some things just may take more time and effort. Web developing and web design are my passion. It is my infinity source of motivation and I hope it will help me to achieve all the highs.
about.need: Need more information about my skills? Download the CV.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Are you working on something great? I would love to help make it happen! Drop me a letter and start your project right now!
